name: EmotionallySoberMind
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Emotional sobriety is creating an integrated balance of emotions the lets you feel and feel deeply without allowing them to hijack your whole life. All your emotions appear but without causing you to want a) jump off a bridge or b) try to sell the bridge to the highest bidder.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
